title: A Gentleman in Moscow - Amor Towles [EN EPUB] [ebook] [p_s]
description:
A Gentleman in Moscow by Amor Towles
English | 2016 | Historical Fiction | 1.2 MB


With his breakout debut novel, Rules of Civility, Amor Towles established himself as a master of absorbing, sophisticated fiction, bringing late 1930s Manhattan to life with splendid atmosphere and a flawless command of style.
A Gentleman in Moscow immerses us in another elegantly drawn era with the story of Count Alexander Rostov. When, in 1922, he is deemed an unrepentant aristocrat by a Bolshevik tribunal, the count is sentenced to house arrest in the Metropol, a grand hotel across the street from the Kremlin. Rostov, an indomitable man of erudition and wit, has never worked a day in his life, and must now live in an attic room while some of the most tumultuous decades in Russian history are unfolding outside the hotelâ€™s doors. Unexpectedly, his reduced circumstances provide him a doorway into a much larger world of emotional discovery.
